column4: how do i install from here? http://github.com/daymun/rtorrent-webui-installer do i do svn checkout http://urlhere ?
you use git i'm sure github has some tutorial in its web
so would i use the git merge command after installin git ?
git pull <url> to get the sources
see the routing table ?
how do you do that?
« ip route » ?
they're showing me two wlan's, one is wlan1 and another is wlan0, it says default is via wlan0
there you go internet is via wlan0
right but wlan0 is connected via the built in wifi card or the usb wifi card? how do i know?
lshw -C Network | less
ah crap, it's using my builtin wifi card (wlan0.. which is faulty), is there a way to assign wlan1 preference over wlan0 ?
why not use the laptop facilities to just disable the card ( added bonus it want draw power). many laptops have a key combo or switch to disable wifi
well, i want to disable the built in wireless card in the laptop and only use the usb wifi card, is that possible to do with ubuntu?
as i said doing that depends on hardware on most laptops
they usually have a button to turn off/on the wifi
hm... yes, weird part is... when i turn off the wifi button on the laptop, the usb card doesn't work x(
maybe it acts on both...
try with the rfkill command
hmm... yeah... i got an idea tho.. what about disabling it via bios? if that doesn't work, i'll try rfkill
or blacklist the internal wifi driver
kesroesweyth suggestion is sound too
